prompts: Create a sleek Electric-type Pokemon with striking yellow fur and blue accents.
I want a fast and agile Pokemon that embodies the spirit of thunder and lightning.
Generate a Pokemon that utilizes both speed and electric attacks in battles.
Make a unique character design for a mythical Pokemon based on a feline creature.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, using agility and electricity.
Design an Electric-type with a dynamic pose, showcasing its powerful abilities.
Show me a legendary Pokemon that has both feline and electric characteristics.
